title: Who spends money like this? - Intel $5,000 Extreme Tech Upgrade
description: Thanks to Intel for sponsoring this series! Buy an Intel Core i9-13900K CPU:   Buy G.Skill 32GB Trident Z5 RGB DDR5 RAM:   Buy an ASUS ROG Maximus Z790 Hero Motherboard:   Buy a Gigabyte M27Q 27" Monitor:    Check Out the EK-Quantum Power Kit D-RGB P360:   Buy Logitech Z906 5.1 Surround Speakers:   Buy KEF Q150 Speakers:   Buy a SVS SB-2000 Pro Subwoofer:   Buy a JDS Labs Element III DAC:   Sonarworks SoundID Reference Measurement Microphone:   Buy a Fanatec ClubSport Shifter SQ:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Discuss on Forum:    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   OUR WAN PODCAST GEAR:   FOLLOW US  ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Facebook:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Twitch:   MUSIC CREDIT --------------------------------------------------- Intro: Laszlo - Supernova Video Link:  iTunes Download Link:  Artist Link:   Outro: Approaching Nirvana - Sugar High Video Link:  Listen on Spotify:  Artist Link:   Intro animation by MBarek Abdelwassaa  Monitor And Keyboard by vadimmihalkevich / CC BY 4.0   Mechanical RGB Keyboard by BigBrotherECE / CC BY 4.0  Mouse Gamer free Model By Oscar Creativo / CC BY 4.0   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 - Intro 1:20 - Jake stole "nothing" 2:03 - Jake Cat Tips 3:14 - Current Setup 3:40 - Jake Art Tips (@thearchitectsgarage) 4:40 - Upgrading the PC 9:48 - We got thicc boys 13:17 - Monitor Setup 16:26 - Back to the PC 20:55 - Finished PC 25:21 - Jake Art Tips 2 (@ilovedoodle) 25:56 - Wubwub 27:06 - Trying the Racing Sim 27:56 - Conclusion
